subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[𢭇]], [[𤗄]], [[𥓁]], [[𦕻]], [[𤴙]], [[𥫑]], [[𢍍]], [[𠭛]]}} <!-- Not sure about 𦹰, 𦠷, 𥀮 -->
* {{l|mul|[[窗]], [[蔥]], [[聰]], [[憁]], [[熜]], [[璁]]}} — in {{w|traditional Chinese}} (Hong Kong and Taiwan), the upper right component for these characters is written 囪 instead of {{l|mul|囱}}. Note that {{l|mul|悤}} on its own is written with {{l|mul|囱}} as the top component.
